EmailTemplate.name: India/SS61.05-04-21 BNK India/SS61 Email 7.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: See NCR’s New Cash Recycling ATM—Just for the Indian Market
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Cash transactions in India are set to hit 83 trillion RUP by 2025.
Suddenly, optimal cash management for ATMs isn’t a luxury anymore—it’s critical. Cash recycling is the seamless solution.
You’ll move more cash transactions to the ATM, relieving pressure on tellers. But more importantly, you’ll significantly reduce cash in transit costs…by as much as 50%. That’s why NCR has just launched our latest cash recycling ATM, the NCR SelfServ 61 – designed specifically for the Indian market.
Be among the first to deliver an amazing experience for your customers—and your staff. ${CTAText} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]>
